VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

description: Removal of BT kiosk(s) and replacement with 1no. new InLink structure offering free Wi-Fi and incorporating 2no. digital 55" LCD adverts.
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of its size and siting would result in a visually intrusive and incongruous addition to the streetscene that would compete with existing street furniture and signage creating street clutter and detract from the character and appearance of the area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
Condition 10 (Cycle Parking) - The RBK Highways Engineer has reviewed the information provided and is satisfied that Condition 10 of planning permission 16/13050/FUL can now be fully approved.

Dear Mr Khalifa,The attachments you have provided are invalid. Your application remains invalid.As stated in the invalidity letter sent to you, in order for your application to be validated it is a requirement that you must:1) Please provide a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with theapplication site outlined in red, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.2) Please provide copies of all existing and proposed elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100,providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for theproposed work.3) Please provide existing and proposed floor plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing ascale bar, showing the outline of entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for theproposed works.4) Please provide existing and proposed roof plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing ascale bar, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposedwork.We suggest you contact an architect to help you provide these documents.
